subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Reggie Evans grabbed a career-high 26 rebounds and scored 22 points as the Nets beat the Trail Blazers for their 20th road win of the season, matching a franchise best.
snippet: Reggie Evans grabbed a career-high 26 rebounds and scored 22 points as the Nets beat the Trail Blazers for their 20th road win of the season, matching a franchise best.
